channel.title: Rune buyer!
channel.description:
well... i have been using a mouse macro, and several oof my level 3's got banned. i dont know how to script myself so if someone could rite a script for me it would be great.
all i need is the script to click "buy 10 chaos runes" "click buy 10 death runes." i prefer it to be quick but un-detectable. also, post what you got.
ty :)
and it doesnt need anti randoms since you dont get randoms while ur buying x[)

item.title: Rune buyer!
item.dc:creator: @kaodite kaodite
item.description:
@kaodite wrote:

ok, well anyone got a simple rune buying script it doesnt have to hop worlds or anything fancy like that…just i guess i wat one that has delays and random mouse movement. [br][size=1]Posted on: February 07, 2007, 08:58:21 AM[/size][hr]any1 crank out a simple rune buying script for chaos and death runes?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune buyer!
item.dc:creator: @Hex_Key Hex Key
item.description:
@Hex_Key wrote:

I have a betty buyer:
Random logs out
Multiple chars
Switches servers when runes are too expensive
Talks
Antirandoms

it make approx 300k per hour profit buting air+fire+mind+chaos and death

item.title: Rune buyer!
item.dc:creator: @kaodite kaodite
item.description:
@kaodite wrote:

ok, yea, i used a mouse macro but my lvl 3’s get banned, the script doesnt have to be "completely undectable, just undectable to where i wont get banned withint 12 hours or so… some1 help me out plz.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune buyer!
item.dc:creator: @Krazy_Meerkat Krazy_Meerkat
item.description:
@Krazy_Meerkat wrote:

“and it doesnt need anti randoms since you dont get randoms while ur buying x[)”
You do, they still spawn but cannot do anything while the shop window is open. I think your account is flagged as suspicous if you do not respond to randoms…

Learn to script, it will be a great asset to you. I have some old rune-buying scripts but they would probably not work anymore and a simple one would get you banned.

Read full topic
